website_summaries.verdict: Delicious Madagascar bourbon vanilla flavored ice cream mix that's popular with children and adults alike.
pros: Works with hand-crank or automatic ice cream machines
Quick and easy: just add cream and milk
Also something for the adventurous cook – can customize recipe by adding ingredients
Non-GMO and no artificial flavors or coloring

website_summaries.verdict: Premium vanilla ice cream mix that will turn your home into a gourmet creamery.
pros: Premium starter with Madagascar bourbon vanilla
Makes rich and creamy ice cream with your half-and-half and whipping cream
A fun family activity that's easy and delicious
Non-GMO, with no artificial flavors, colors, preservatives, trans fats, or corn syrup solids
cons: A few found the flavor too sweet

customer_reviews.title: Like Old-fashion Homemade
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure if I was gonna like this product since I grew up on old-fashioned homemade ice cream. We used the ice, rock salt and the wood bucket with the crank. This method took hours to make the ice cream but it was worth the wait. This mix comes close to the original homemade cream. I was so impressed I recently ordered my second box and will be making my second batch over the weekend. I even froze the leftover and it retained its soft-serve consistency which I was was not expecting. This was well worth the money and I will be a frequent buyer.
customer_reviews.author: Brown Eyes

customer_reviews.title: Very Vanilla
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea how Triple Scoop manages to imbue their ice cream mixes with such genuine & natural flavors, but imbue them they do. Light, creamy (as are all Triple Scoop's mixes), flavorful, & delicious, their vanilla is perfect for enlivening a bland dessert, or for serving on its own with a topping of home-made jam. When making this ice cream, I've sometimes mixed-in a little melted chocolate, small pieces of fresh fruit, or a few drops of almond extract, all with delicious results.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Drab aka Tassy Cotton

customer_reviews.title: Quicker, easier but still homemade
customer_reviews.text: Used this the first time we used the ice cream maker. It was really good but seemed to cpensive. Didn’t use it the second time Discovered it isn’t that expensive after all. True taste without all the eggs and stuff. Will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: winteropal

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazingly delicious. I use organic ingredients. All you need is whole milk, half-and-half, and heavy whipping cream. If you can’t use milk substitute it. I would give it a 10/10. The taste is better than blue Bell. I just got my ice cream machine and I’m already on my fourth box of this ice cream. The cool thing about it is. I can make whatever type of candy mixture I want that mainstream companies don’t have. (Look at photo.)
customer_reviews.author: De Thomas

customer_reviews.title: The vanilla flavor is amazing. What is so great about this product is ...
customer_reviews.text: This makes a delicious vanilla ice cream! The vanilla flavor is amazing. What is so great about this product is that not only is it easy to make, but with the vanilla you can add in your own touches and create your own flavors. My husband loves to cook and has been making his own ice cream for years. With this product he has been having fun creating his own gourmet flavors like adding a ribbon of salted caramel, or adding a balsamic reduction with strawberries, or one time he infused earl grey tea in it. I highly recommend giving it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Edward M

customer_reviews.title: Buying this mix is the best way to make ice cream
customer_reviews.text: Buying this mix is the best way to make ice cream. It is so easy and is very delicious. It comes with two pouches, I decided to make the first one and serve it with brownies and toppings and everyone loved the ice cream. it is rich and creamy and very tasty. I highly recommend this product and will try the other flavors they have available.
customer_reviews.author: Reed

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and sweet
customer_reviews.text: Pros: you can use it as a base for your favorite flavor. Sweet and creamy as the recipe calls for half and half plus heavy whipping cream. Cons: none
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: it is easy to make and tastes great with a rich vanilla ...
customer_reviews.text: Delicious ice cream mix, it is easy to make and tastes great with a rich vanilla flavor. The vanilla ice cream taste is delicious and is also a great base if you want to experiment making your own creations. I added chopped up peanut butter cups and my whole family loved it. I will be ordering more of this mix, I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a rip off
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced sugar and vanilla. Certainly not worth $11 per box. You still need to include half and half and milk. I’m glad it’s no longer available. I won’t purchase any of the other overpriced flavors either. I made blueberry ice cream using a recipe and fresh ingredients without any ice cream mix. You don’t need a mix. Maybe I will gift these.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product- delicious and pleased with ingredients
customer_reviews.text: So impressed with this product! Was disappointed after reading the instructions on our new icecream makes that we needed to use an icecream powder because I like to use good ingredients and make things from scratch. Was very pleased to see only 4 ingredients- and all were ones I’d be using anyway. Tastes amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Springer

customer_reviews.title: It’s very dangerous but Just listen to the directions
customer_reviews.text: Hi I’m Emma and my review is about how much like the vanilla mix its very good to use because it has no artificial flavors and it makes very good yummy ice cream
customer_reviews.author: lucille the ford minivan

customer_reviews.title: Great homemade ice cream
customer_reviews.text: We are an ice cream family. I make most of it and I was very pleased with this product simply because it has all the components of a good ice cream. Many ice cream, once it is in the freezer become as hard as Concrete but this one is easy to scoop. I will keep buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard  Field

customer_reviews.title: Easy and delicious
customer_reviews.text: This was very simple to mix up and the results were fantastic! We added some fresh peaches after it was ready to eat and it was yummy!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew L. Sharpe

customer_reviews.title: It only replace sugar and vanila extract
customer_reviews.text: It only can replace Vanila extract and sugar. You still need milk, Half and half and heavy cream. NO POINT you get this just for ice cream. Even quality was not good for the price. No difference from Hagen-daaz.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't believe how good it was!
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a good but very average packaged product. Was I wrong! This vanilla was wonderfully rich and a perfect recipe for anyone's first time DIY ice cream maker experience. If anything, it sets future expectations sky high. Don't expect your own recipes to be this good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Good and Easy
customer_reviews.text: This Triple Scoop Ice Cream Mix make terrific ice cream. It is easy, just pour the mix into the milks and stir, then transfer to your ice cream maker. The downside if the price as nearly $13 for a half gallon and you still have to add the price of the heavy cream and milks.
customer_reviews.author: SandyW

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice flavor
customer_reviews.text: This flavor of ice cream tastes great specially when you add your touch to it some of the other ones have bitter taste and taste nasty but this company here the quality they put in taste nice
customer_reviews.author: marcells

customer_reviews.title: Flavor is excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This product was a gift for my 9 year old grandchild. It was her first homemade ice cream process. The flavor was excellent. The first batch was a different product. Ice cream was grainy. The second batch was your product. Excellent ice cream! We will definitely reorder your mix.
customer_reviews.author: Melaney

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! I add a little bit more pure real vanilla to the mixture. Great add-ins are mini chocolate chips or mini M&M's. Will make more purchases in the future. Only wish this was a bit cheaper. By the time you purchase the mix and the cream and half and half it isn't cheap. But ease and flavor is worth it. Great for at home ice cream parties!!!
customer_reviews.author: Erika Moore

customer_reviews.title: Easy to make
customer_reviews.text: Gone are the days of hand cranked ice cream makers and use of ice and salt. (At least for me!) We have an automatic ice cream maker and using this mix is extremely easy. Just follow the simple directions and the end product tastes great. It won't be like the home made ice cream of old, but it sure is a lot easier to let the machine do the work - once you add a few simple ingredients to the mix.
customer_reviews.author: George G

customer_reviews.title: Loved it! Family hit for sure - I used ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! Family hit for sure - I used 1 1/2 cups of Heavy Cream & 1 1/2 cups of Whole milk instead of the Half & half it called for and it turned out great!
customer_reviews.author: A. Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Too sweet
customer_reviews.text: It tasted good and froze good, but way too sweet for our family.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: DELISH VANILLA ICE CREAM
customer_reviews.text: This mix could not be easier -- no cooking -- just pour the ingredients, stir, and put into ice cream maker. I definitely will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Lin N.

customer_reviews.title: Fast to make, taste and texture just like soft serve
customer_reviews.text: Each envelope makes 1 quart, I use half and make 1 pint. I have made it with heavy cream and milk and half and half 1/2 cup each, also with just half and half and milk 3/4 cup each, and with just milk 1.5 cups. Honestly, I don't see much difference, it comes out great every time.
customer_reviews.author: C MCFARLAND

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great little ice cream with natural flavors! I suggest adding vanilla bean paste!!!! Great starter base for add ins!
customer_reviews.author: slygrl88

customer_reviews.title: High priced for sugar packets.
customer_reviews.text: I thought for the price. the box box is way overpriced. I can buy a quart of Tillimook ice cream for around five dollars. Each box claims it makes two quarts. You are paying 12 dollars plus for two packets of sugar with powdered vanilla. Its about two cups of sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S.

customer_reviews.title: Very good.
customer_reviews.text: You need an ice cream maker to use this product. I don't have one but decided to use it anyway. The product was frozen solid using just a tray. It was still very good. I just scraped the ice and ate it.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: I use one bag, it good, but small amout of ice cream
customer_reviews.author: Anna Teresa Hull

customer_reviews.title: Easy way to make outstanding Vanilla Ice Cream
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and easy way to enjoy great Vanilla ice cream! I also used it as a base for Peach with the addition of fresh peaches and peach marmade.
customer_reviews.author: Joe H.

customer_reviews.title: Complete waste of money
customer_reviews.text: So much money & you do not get all the ingredients you need. Extreme waste of money for low quality worthless ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Creamy texture
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT. Saves a lot of time and it’s flavor & texture is so smooth and creamy. Added strawberries. YUMMMMMM
customer_reviews.author: Nana from Iowa

customer_reviews.title: GOOD STUFF BUT JUST EXPENSIVE
customer_reviews.text: PRODUCT IS HANDS DOWN THE BEST!!!!! BUT THE PRICE IS TO HIGH!!!
customer_reviews.author: TROY HILLERY

customer_reviews.title: Not that great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our family was disappointed in this mix. It didn't taste very good and never wanted to freeze completely. Save your money!
customer_reviews.author: James Southard

customer_reviews.title: Product good/Price Not so good
customer_reviews.text: The product was great but the price is really steep for what you get
customer_reviews.author: LCBOBB

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: This ice cream mix was wonderful in my mixer!!! Yummy flavor and can't wait to purchase again!! Whole vitamin D milk and cream make it so so good!!
customer_reviews.author: Tray

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ice cream
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. Made a delicious batch of ice cream. I just tweaked it with a little extra vanilla.
customer_reviews.author: B. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: This ice cream is smooth and my family loves it ...
customer_reviews.text: This ice cream is smooth and my family loves it. It was creamy and not grainy. I will be using it for guests.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great taste!
customer_reviews.text: I got an ice cream maker as a gift and I was looking for healthy ice cream mixes. We have tried chocolate and vanilla. They are both great. Creamy and sweet taste. Great value and I can read all the ingredients!
customer_reviews.author: K. J. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Old style vanilla and soft serve!
customer_reviews.text: What a great taste. The homemade style soft real vanilla ice cream. My family loves it and with different fruits and other things added it just awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: vanilla ice cream
customer_reviews.text: I've now had all three flavors, and I have to say...I would like to see the ice cream to be thicker than the milk or heavy cream. The ice cream has a good flavor though.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Great. Makes ice cream making easier. Vanilla is good base to add to ie peppermint coffee et.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L.

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: Made making homemade ice cream incredibly easy and it tasted great!
customer_reviews.author: Smanore

customer_reviews.title: Easy and tastes good
customer_reviews.text: Love the product want to beable to make from scratch
customer_reviews.author: kAY SCHUBERT

customer_reviews.title: Amazing ice cream
customer_reviews.text: I always purchased from William Sonoma but never again. This ice cream is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Friends like this.
customer_reviews.text: Love it and have gotten many praises for serving the ice cream.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Hostess

customer_reviews.title: 00% happy!
customer_reviews.text: I need this to make my own MACH Green Tea Shakes! !00% happy!
customer_reviews.author: Paul B.

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Truly easy way to make ice cream that tastes premium. I buy basic flavors and use my own flavoring.
customer_reviews.author: Anna D. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Fun! We bought Vanilla- Mix Triple Scoop Ice Cream with ingredients as recommended, pour and plug in your ice cream machine for a delicious treat. My first time using this product, I have since ordered more. Yum
customer_reviews.author: Paula S.

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite
customer_reviews.text: Love this ice cream mix! It’s my favorite. Just wish they had more flavors like dulce de leche.
customer_reviews.author: Herman G Bancroft

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! The ice cream is so creamy and delicious. We use it with crushed up Oreos yum!
customer_reviews.author: kimberly maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: This is truly the best vanilla ice cream I have ever tasted. Very creamy and extremely delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This ice cream mix is awesome. I highly recommended it!
customer_reviews.author: Randy J. Milligan

customer_reviews.title: Great taste gets it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great, but with whipping cream, half and half and whole milk it's hard not to taste good. it is a little spendy for the amount you get.
customer_reviews.author: RodgerHoll

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is ice cream mix tastes great! It is quick and easy to make.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy, and great tasting.
customer_reviews.text: A great product; I used this for a group camp out with fantastic results. The taste was fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Boen

customer_reviews.title: Needs icecream maker.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize you needed a icecream maker. I am unable to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: This mix was just okay.It pretty much just contains sugar and vanilla flavoring and only makes two quarts.I can just use my own sugar and vanilla and save my money next time.It was too expensive for no more than it makes.
customer_reviews.author: frauzy

customer_reviews.title: I've already reordered!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this product to take on a 3 generation vacation, and eveyone loved it! We've already reordered the vanilla ice cream!
customer_reviews.author: B Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Ice Cream
customer_reviews.text: Triple Scoop makes a creamy ice cream. My wife says it's better than Dairy Queen
customer_reviews.author: DD Yates

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR KETO DIET
customer_reviews.text: NOT KETO!!! DECEITFUL WEB DESCRIPTION: CONTAINS SUGAR CANE — NO REFUND EITHER—
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Sala

customer_reviews.title: Incredible ice cream
customer_reviews.text: Delicious! Yummy! Amazing product. I’ll order more, without hesitation. The best mix on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Ice Cream
customer_reviews.text: This ice cream is very delicious have bought again since my initial purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cain

customer_reviews.title: Excellent flavor
customer_reviews.text: Excellent flavor. Easy to use mix. Appreciate more natural ingredients. Bought vanilla flavor but would like to try other available flavors in future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Creamy
customer_reviews.text: This ice cream is so creamy. I cannot wait to try other flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzspurs

customer_reviews.title: yum!
customer_reviews.text: Creamy and delicious! The best homemade ice cream! The amount of vanilla flavor is perfect, not overwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: Angelita M Whatley

customer_reviews.title: great ice cream
customer_reviews.text: Used this ice cream at a family outing and everuone loved it. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Byron Hepper

customer_reviews.title: Best ice cream base.
customer_reviews.text: This is best ice cream base. I've made 8 batches before and this order is enough for 8 more.
customer_reviews.author: GARY E. COHEN

customer_reviews.title: Best mix I can find, delicious
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, cheap compared to buying your own ingredients and its delicious.
customer_reviews.author: James L Sibley

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy and sweet using the recipe supplied.
customer_reviews.text: Really rich and sweet. It's very filling using the recipe supplied. You can't have much without feeling overwhelmed by the richness. Perhaps it would be better if made with skim milk (I haven't skim milk yet).
customer_reviews.author: Paddows

product_meta.title: Triple Scoop Ice Cream Mix, Premium Vanilla, starter for use with home ice cream maker, non-gmo, no artificial colors or flavors, ready in under 30 mins, makes 2 qts (1 15oz box)
feature_bullets: TURN YOUR HOME INTO A GOURMET CREAMERY - Premium Vanilla ice cream starter with Madagascar bourbon vanilla. Homemade ice cream never tasted so rich, creamy, and flavorful.
MAKES FRESH, DELICIOUS ICE CREAM - Whisk together ice cream mix, half and half, whipping cream. Pour into your ice cream machine. In half an hour, you’re eating fresh, cold, soft ice cream - yum
QUICK & EASY FAMILY FUN - No need to struggle with recipes, we’ve done the work for you. Try all our ice cream starter mix flavors for parties, snacks, desserts. Excellent for hot days.

NON-GMO PROJECT VERIFIED - With Triple Scoop, your family is eating fresh, real-food ingredients. No artificial flavors, colors, preservatives, trans fats, or corn syrup solids. No gums or emulsifiers.
MAKES TWO 1-QUART BATCHES - Each box makes two 1-quart batches. Works with any ice cream maker - automatic or hand-crank. Kid-approved.

specifications.Manufacturer: Atlast Supply Chain Consulting Group - Grocery
